ngoy.core

Annotation Type Inject


  • @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Inject
    An annotated field's value or setter method will be injected right after the component/class was instantiated but before OnInit will be called.

    The annotated field must be public, non-final, non-static.
    The annotated setter method must be public, non-static and must have exactly one parameter.
    Constructor parameters must not be annotated.

    Example: 

     @Component(...)
 public class MyComponent {
        @Inject
        public MyService service;
 
        @Inject
        public void setOtherService(OtherService otherService) {
                ...
        }
 }

    You can use any annotation that is named Inject.

    See Also:
    Optional
